review_title: The best one as they can make
review_discription: I find neckback as practicle in comparision to earbuds.What I like about this realme headset is :-1. App support2. Big driver hence lound enough.3. Magnetic on/off4. Dual device pairing, easily connects with my laptop and phone (I don't have to move even a finger, it's seamless)5. Bass is loud and clear, it has a deep bass feature through app which is very good.6. Spatial audio (through app) take the music experience to next level, I just don't wanna listen to music without Spatial audio.7. Voice clarity is good and audible.8. ANC is good but limited to 30db, there is room for improvement but good for the price range.Also unlike other brands, the magnet are relative strong and better, I mean it sticks and stays that way.If they come with any upgrade, I want think twice to pick it.

Product_name: realme Buds Wireless 3 in-Ear Bluetooth Headphones,30dB ANC, Spatial Audio,13.6mm Dynamic Bass Driver,Upto 40 Hours Playback, Fast Charging, 45ms Low Latency for Gaming,Dual Device Connection (Black)
review_title: AUDIO DESYNC ISSUE and Top SEAL OPEN BEFORE UNBOXING.
review_discription: I have tried this on two different units and both seem to have the same issue. In both BOXES THE TOP SEAL WAS OPEN which is suspicious whether it was not sealed properly or unboxed and used. It isnt being brought up anywhere and I found only few reviews mention this issue which still is not fixed even on latest firmware. Tried everything from resetting, turning on/dual connection, ANC on off etc. But it doesn't seem to fix the issue.If you primarily use it on phone it is an Ok neckband as there are not many good options.  Sound loudness(with the volume enhancer off) is average. Ear fit is subjective but it didnt feel snug personally. Surprisingly one plus bullets Z(1 gen 4 years old) seems to have better sound and fit in ear compared to this.

Product_name: realme Buds Wireless 3 in-Ear Bluetooth Headphones,30dB ANC, Spatial Audio,13.6mm Dynamic Bass Driver,Upto 40 Hours Playback, Fast Charging, 45ms Low Latency for Gaming,Dual Device Connection (Black)
review_discription: The "Average Earbuds" live up to their name‚Äîthey‚Äôre pretty standard and meet basic expectations.The sound quality is fine but nothing extraordinary. The bass is present but lacks punch, the mids are clear enough for vocals, and the highs are a bit sharp at times. For casual listening or podcasts, they‚Äôre adequate, but audiophiles will find them lacking.The design is minimalist, with a simple plastic build. They‚Äôre lightweight, but this comes at the cost of feeling slightly cheap. The fit is decent, but they may not be suitable for intense workouts as they can slip out.

Sound reproduction of low, high and mid ranges are amazing, considering the micro size. Battery life is also very good, yet to go below 70% with moderate play at low volume. Yes, considering baby's ears, we are operating it at maximum 40% of its volume.Amazing product only Bose can deliver.Cons: Charging port is USB Type-B. Nowadays all are having Type-C.

Product_name: Bose SoundLink Micro, Portable Outdoor Speaker, (Wireless Bluetooth Connectivity), Black
review_title: Exceptional Audio Quality- in a word Awesome
review_discription: This was my second purchase of this product. Previous one was taken by my elder sister as she also loved it. From the moment I unboxed the sleek and compact device, the build quality spoke volumes about Bose's craftsmanship. The speaker feels robust and well-built, with a modern design that effortlessly blends style and functionality. The compact size makes it highly portable, fitting seamlessly into my lifestyle, whether at home, on the go, or during outdoor activities.The true magic, however, lies in the speaker's audio performance. The Bose Portable Bluetooth Speaker delivers a stunningly rich and immersive sound that defies its compact size. The bass is deep and resonant, the mids are clear and well-defined, and the highs are crisp without being harsh. Whether I was playing my favorite music genres, podcasts, or even streaming movies, the speaker consistently provided a premium audio experience.Bluetooth connectivity was seamless, with a reliable range that allowed me to move around without sacrificing audio quality. The battery life exceeded my expectations, providing hours of playback on a single charge. The intuitive controls on the speaker allowed for easy navigation between tracks, adjusting volume, and managing calls, making it a user-friendly device.One standout feature is the water-resistant design, adding an extra layer of durability for worry-free use in various environments. This feature, coupled with the sturdy build, makes the Bose Portable Bluetooth Speaker an ideal companion for outdoor adventures.In conclusion, the Bose Portable Bluetooth Speaker is a testament to Bose's commitment to delivering top-tier audio experiences. Its combination of exceptional sound quality, portability, and durability make it a standout choice in the crowded market of portable speakers. While the premium price tag may be a consideration, the investment is undoubtedly worth it for those who prioritize an unmatched audio experience on the go.

Product_name: Bose SoundLink Micro, Portable Outdoor Speaker, (Wireless Bluetooth Connectivity), Black
review_title: The best portable Bluetooth Mobile speaker
review_discription: My wife has been using this Bose speaker for the past 3 years or so.  I used it for a short while to connect to Microsoft Teams meetings as well as Zoom meetings.  Many people wouldn't have realised this product also has in-built microphone to attend meetings.  The microphone is excellent in picking up the right audio and eliminating external sound.  I enjoyed it for meetings.  I would have gone for a pair but I didn't know if it works in Stereo mode when pair.  So I settled for a pair of some other brand.The audio output is voluminous.  It is difficult to believe it is only 12W.  It sounds like a 20W speaker.  Quality (fidelity) is excellent too with good bass boost.  It has controls for bluetooth, power and volume up & down.

Product_name: Bose SoundLink Micro, Portable Outdoor Speaker, (Wireless Bluetooth Connectivity), Black
review_discription: This is a good speaker overall.  Sound clarity is very good.  Vocals and instruments can be heard clearly.  It is loud too - for a small room/space, it will be sufficient.  Coming to bass, I'm not very sure I'd say good or bad.  From the reviews I had read, I thought it would have very powerful bass.  But I was initially disappointed.  I felt bass weak.  I'm used to listening to speakers like Bose SoundLink Mini 2, Bose SoundLink III, and more recently Bose SoundLink Flex.  They all have powerful bass.  Perhaps being used to them, I felt the bass of Micro very weak.  However, I then felt that it's not the same on every song/video.  For some audio/video, the bass on Micro is very good - for some others, it's not so good.  Similarly, the bass on Micro in general feels good in low to medium volume levels, but weak afterwards.  But the low to medium volume level is not usually sufficient for a big room/space.  So, I think it is important that one has right expectations regarding bass on Micro.  But the clarity is consistently very good which is a plus.  Its clarity is more or less same as the more recent Flex's, but Flex has much powerful bass.Overall, for personal listening in a small space, Micro is a very good speaker.  It sounds nice and clear, and pleasant to listen to.  Flex is for bigger space and more powerful bass.Update:  Earlier, I had given 5 stars rating, but I've now reduced it to 4.  The reason is that, my Micro has been having Bluetooth connectivity problems repeatedly.  It does not connect to a device that was earlier connected.  It is able to announce the name of the device, which means it remembers the device, but somehow does not connect.  Even when it is put the "ready to connect" mode, it won't connect.  Then I have to do factory reset (by pressing the power button for long) but doing so erases the list of all earlier devices.  Also, from the other device, I need to remove the Micro and then re-add/re-pair.  Doing all this very rarely might be acceptable, but I'm having to do it quite often.  I never faced this issue with my other Bose bluetooth-based speakers.  So, the software on my Micro looks rather inferior, or poorly tested.

review_discription: WRITING THIS REVIEW AFTER 20 MONTHS OF USAGE. I BOUGHT THIS PAIR ON 22nd DEC 2022. I HAVE USED IT EXTENSIVELY FOR CALLS (ABOUT 5-6 HOURS A DAY) FOR THE FIRST 12 MONTHS AND HAVE HARDLY USED IT IN THE SECOND YEAR, PERHAPS AN HOUR A DAY FOR LISTENING TO MUSIC, THIS PAST DECEMBER 2023. I AM IN AUGUST 2024 AND THE BATTERY DOESNT EVEN LAST 10 MINUTES NOW.SLIGHLTY DISSAPOINTING, CONSIDERING ITS A JBL AND THE PRICE RANGE WAS AROUND 5K. THE SOUND QUALITY ISN'T THAT GREAT EITHER, BUT I FELT THAT IN 5K, IT WAS PROBABLY GOOD SOUND. HOWEVER, I AM EMPHASIZING AGAIN, I EXPECTED THE BATTERY TO LAST ATLEAST FOR AROUND 2.5 - 3 YEARS.THE BATTERY LIFE DIDNT REDUCE GRADUALLY. IT WAS STRAIGHT DOWN FROM 4 HOURS TO 10 MINUTES NOW. I WOULD RE-CONSIDER BEFORE BUYING THIS AGAIN. I AM SURE THERE ARE SOME OTHER COMPETITORS OFFERING BETTER VALUE FOR MONEY IN THIS RANGE.HOPE THIS HELPS !

Product_name: JBL Tune 130NC in Ear Wireless TWS EarBuds with Mic, ANC Earbuds(Upto 40Db), Customizable Bass with Headphones App, 40Hrs Playtime, Legendary Sound, 4 Mics for Clear Calls, Bluetooth 5.2 (Blue)
review_title: One of the best Out of ear TWS
review_discription: I was looking for a product which offers the our office the earliest design, given most TWS have moved toward in ear.At this price point of under 3K, this JBL product was a good fit.  The companion app is also very easy to install , pair and has multiple options.First time pairing experience was good and connection is pretty stable.Build Quality : The buds sit securely, and the magnets are strong. The case build quality could have been better , as the lid opening mechanism feels a little flimsy. Coming from using OnePlus this case does not give confidence while opening and closing.Audio : I am not a huge audiophile, but enjoy most sound sources on this buds. Very balanced sound, and the companion app allows for moded and EQ to adjust as per your audio needs.Volume : The capability of adjusting volume control on the buds is a very useful feature, as you need not go back to your phone. Also the highs and lows are decent,given that out of ear design . Most surprising was the effect of Noice cancellation, which was good.Mic : Mic quality is decent for its price point. When on calls, the other person never faced any issue with the voice quality and clarity.Appearance : Looks good with minimalist design and LED indicators, both in case and buds .Performance : Overall a good handy TWS with good battery life of close to 6 hours and good connectivity, with feature rich companion app.Would have rated 5 if the case and lid felt a little solid.

Product_name: JBL Tune 130NC in Ear Wireless TWS EarBuds with Mic, ANC Earbuds(Upto 40Db), Customizable Bass with Headphones App, 40Hrs Playtime, Legendary Sound, 4 Mics for Clear Calls, Bluetooth 5.2 (Blue)
review_title: Remained good only for a year
review_discription: I am unsatisfied with JBL and will not buy any JBL earbuds in the future. I purchased these earbuds around 1.5 years ago from Amazon. Both buds worked fine for a year (warranty period). But, after a year, the right earbud started discharging faster (lasted only for around 45 mins). So, I searched the internet for this behaviour and found some master-slave solution (which didn't work). And, after around 6 months, the left earbud also lasts for around an hour. I purchased these earbuds for around 3.5k, hoping branded earbuds would last long. I even bought a blue cover (shown in the image) to protect the charging case. However, the cover will be of no use now. I am also attaching the picture of boAt Airdopes 441 which I bought for my sister around 4 years ago, and they are working fine till now. I am not promoting boAt, but I am saying my choice of purchasing JBL-branded earbuds was wrong. I should have gone with some low-cost earbuds or some other brand.

Product_name: JBL Tune 130NC in Ear Wireless TWS EarBuds with Mic, ANC Earbuds(Upto 40Db), Customizable Bass with Headphones App, 40Hrs Playtime, Legendary Sound, 4 Mics for Clear Calls, Bluetooth 5.2 (Blue)
review_title: Manufacturing Defective Earphones and Poor Customer Service
review_discription:
The media could not be loaded.
                



These JBL Tune 130 NC earphones don't fit properly. Everyone in my office tried them, using all the different buds that came with the headphones, but they keep falling out, even when sitting still.When I contacted Amazon, they told me to call JBL customer care and get a defective warranty card. However, when I called JBL, they refused to provide such a certificate.This is a classic example of a scam. Amazon directs you to the brand's service center, but the service center won't help. You end up running between both, and eventually, your refund period expires, leaving you without a refund.

review_title: Stylish Smartwatch with Good Features but Room for Improvement
review_discription:
I purchased the boAt Xtend Smart Watch, and my experience has been a mix of positives and some areas for improvement. The smartwatch boasts a 1.69‚Äù HD display that is clear and vibrant, making it easy to navigate through various features. The design is sleek and stylish, which adds a touch of elegance to my everyday outfits. I particularly like the strap color in sandy cream, which is perfect for ladies and adds a sophisticated touch to the overall look.The sleep tracking functionality is decent, but it lacks the detailed insights provided by some other brands. It tracks the basic parameters, but I believe there‚Äôs room for improvement in accuracy.  The mobile app is quite user-friendly and offers a smooth experience. It‚Äôs easy to sync the watch with the app, and the data representation is clear and comprehensive.I would rate the smartwatch's overall accuracy at 3 stars. It performs well for basic fitness tracking but isn‚Äôt as precise when it comes to more detailed health metrics.

The smartwatch boasts a 1.69‚Äù HD display that is clear and vibrant, making it easy to navigate through various features. The design is sleek and stylish, which adds a touch of elegance to my everyday outfits. It performs well for basic fitness tracking but isn‚Äôt as precise when it comes to more detailed health metrics.

review_title: NoiseFit is nice smartwatch this watch is 100 sports
review_discription:
The media could not be loaded.
                



The NoiseFit Twist smartwatch offers a smooth UI, over 100 watch faces, quick reply features, multiple sports modes, single-chip Bluetooth calling, IP68 water resistance, and more Here are some key points to consider:- Design and Build Quality: The NoiseFit Twist has a nice and attractive design, but the build quality could have been improved, especially with the strap.- Display and UI: The smartwatch has a 1.38-inch TFT display with a resolution of 240√ó240 px, which is bright and easily visible even in outdoor conditions.- Watch Faces: You will get more than 100 cloud-based watch faces, but only four built-in watch faces.- Bluetooth Calling and Notifications: The NoiseFit Twist supports the latest Bluetooth version, 5.3, and has a quick reply feature, but lacks a call transfer feature ¬π.- Health Monitoring: The smartwatch offers health parameters like heart rate monitor, SpO2 monitor, stress monitor, sleep monitor, and female cycle tracker ¬π.- Sports Modes: The NoiseFit Twist comes with over 100 sports modes, but you can only access ten modes at a time on the smartwatch.- Battery Life and Charging: The smartwatch has a battery life of up to 6 days and takes about 2 hours to chargeOverall, the NoiseFit Twist is a solid choice for those looking for a budget-friendly circular smartwatch.
Read more

review_title: The watch itself is great but the app sucks a bit.
review_discription:
The product looks amazing and fits perfectly. You get a tool inside the box for adjusting the strap length according to your convenience. The battery backup is good (but not 7 days as advertised, it's like 3 to 4 days max. on average use). I don't use it for fitness tracking, so I won't say much about that, but it has a lot of those features though. Bluetooth calling is great, very good sound and mic quality for a watch. Overall, a 4 out of 5 for the watch.Now when it comes to the app associated with it, which is the NoiseFit app, it sucks a bit. I had continuous connectivity issues from the beginning. The initial setup somehow works fine, but once you get disconnected from Bluetooth, it is impossible to reconnect again (at least on my phone). The only way to reconnect is to unpair from the app (which also doesn't work), unpair the watch from your device settings, reset the watch, uninstall the app, again reinstall the app and start over everything again. Yes, that's what you have to do. And the customer service also sucks, why the hell do you need 3 WORKING DAYS to just respond to the complaint ticket? Even after responding they couldn't solve my issue for another 4 days. Then I just decided to give up on them and tried resetting my entire smartphone, and IT STILL DOESN'T GET SOLVED. So, I start over again and decided to never turn off Bluetooth. It's been fine until now at least. Overall app and customer service rating, 2 out of 5.
Read more

review_title: A Solid Budget Option with Bluetooth calling
review_discription:
The budget-friendly smartwatch offers impressive value for money, especially for those looking for essential features. One standout feature is the Bluetooth calling facility, allowing you to make and receive calls directly from your wrist. The audio quality is surprisingly clear, and the built-in microphone picks up your voice well, making it a convenient tool for quick calls when your phone isn‚Äôt easily accessible.In terms of design, the smartwatch is comfortable to wear, with a responsive touchscreen that is easy to navigate. The display is bright and sharp, making it readable even under direct sunlight.The watch covers all the basics, including fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking.Overall, this smartwatch is a great option for those on a budget who want the convenience of Bluetooth calling and all the essential features of a smartwatch, This one is worth considering.
Read more

Product_name: Canon EOS 1500D 24.1MP Digital SLR Camera (Black) with EF S18-55 is II Lens - Wi-Fi/NFC Supported
Canon EOS 1500D 24.1MP Digital SLR Camera (Black) with EF S18-55 is II Lens - Wi-Fi/NFC Supported
review_discription: Canon 1500d in my opinion is one of the best best camera for people who are just beginning with photography. It comes with multiple lens options. One can get 18-55mm, 55-210mm, 70-300mm as we as 50mm prime lens. I usually use 70-300 and the photos are excellent in daylight. It does have some disadvantage in low light as it shows some grains and handheld pics can be blurry. I recommend to use tripod for night photography. We get multiple options (eg. Auto, manual, portrait, landscape, food, sports, etc)Also, the battery is fairly good and you can use it for 2 days continuously with moderate photography frequency.Body is company and sturdy. The weight distribution makes it feel lighter.We get wifi support, to import images in smartphone immeiately.Various image quality like raw, large, med, small, raw+large, etc are provided.Videography (including sound quality) is fairly good.

review_title: Terrible, cheap HP product! NO CAPS LOCK LIGHT. You might be the unlucky 1 in 10 like me. DO NOT BUY
review_discription: This product is a complete disappointment. The sensitivity is extremely poor. I bought it a month ago, and it started having issues shortly after. The return window is very short, and getting it serviced would cost more in transportation than the product is worth. It also has a copy-paste problem, and to make matters worse, there‚Äôs no Caps Lock indicator light. This wasn't mentioned, but it reflects the outdated design of the product. Many times, it types "C" instead of copying the content, which is frustrating, especially when you have to type everything manually. I don't recommend this product for office work; it will irritate you when typing passwords and doing copy-paste tasks. Don‚Äôt be swayed by the positive reviews‚Äîyou might be the next person to receive a faulty product. Beware, and think twice before buying this cheap, low-quality item.

review_discription: You can not miss this to have it if you own a car.  This thing of a piece works like magic for me. I had so many scratches on my new car and I was very afraid that I might get those parts repainted. I was literally thought of filing a claim as well for those scratches. The one i have attached in media is the smallest one there were many more worse than this.I bought this with no expectations and very surprised by the results i got. Almost 80-90% of the scratches were removed completely when rubbed well with a microfiber cloth.If you have scratches on your car, do not doubt a bit and go ahead with this one.

review_discription: Bizdudes on Amazon Leadership PrinciplesJeff Bezos developed Amazon into an outstanding company that saves its customers an outstanding amount of time and money. Amazon‚Äôs Leadership Principles have nothing to do with Amazon‚Äôs espoused leadership principles. Amazon‚Äôs success has all to do with the tactics and strategy that Bezos utilized to start his business. As an employee of DE Shaw, Bezos transitioned into the banking industry when he became a product manager at Bankers Trust from 1988 to 1990. He then joined D. E. Shaw & Co, a newly created hedge fund with a strong emphasis on mathematical modelling from 1990 until 1994. Bezos became D. E. Shaw's fourth senior vice-president by age 30. At D.E. Shaw, Bezos had access to a database of persons who were not computer literate but who purchased high margin products. The persons who purchased books were wives of wealthy Northeast husbands who provided their wives with funding with little concern on how they spent their allowances. Their wives spent their money on books which were high margin products.In the interim, Bezos did cultivate friends at DE Shaw, 20 of whom advanced Bexos $50,000 each and parents who advanced Bezos $246,000. Books were a vehicle but were not a goal of his Amazon enterprise. Bezos would have sold Twinkies had they been a high margin product purchased by persons of wealth with a free spending budget. Bezos is now on the welfare dole along with Elon Musk in securing government funds for ill advised space adventures.

review_discription: Aug 17, 2024 This Logitech mouse is working great.  It was easy to setup and use.  And though I didn't find instructions saying so, the receiver is housed inside the house where the batteries are.  I thought it had been lost out of the shipping box, but no, it was hidden in the battery compartment.  From there, it is easy to remove and plug into my pc, but did cause some initial confusion.  And I suppose for travel purposes, that is a nice place to put it and be able to keep up with it.  Overall, very pleased and like this mouse.

review_discription: Quality and finish is poor, but considering the price range its justifiable. Dont expect the quality of a 600rs Allen Solly t-shirt from a 350rs Symbol tshirt.Material is thin on comparison and can expect it to go out of shape after a wash, personally I dont think its worth the money, spent 250 more for a good quality t-shirt.I returned mine and ordered from Allen Solly for 549rs under offer, they sell good quality products around 600-700rs range, other good brands seems to charge more.

review_discription: Delivery was quite fast . The bag looks like bit hard polycarbonate which gives me some doubt whether it can handle the stress of airport handling. Though travelled once with it and need to see whether it can last for at least 5 years like all my previous luggage bags. I should have bought the larger size, the current size i bought can only fit short time travellers i.e 3 to 5 days. I should have bought the 70 or 72" in order to buy the standard size. I would recommend if it is for domestic use but for overseas regular use (3 trips a year), i have wait and watch.

Product_name: Portronics Power Plate 10 Extension Board with 4 Universal Sockets, 3 Meter Long Cord, 1500 Watts, 6 Amp Multi Plug for Office & Home Appliances (Black)
review_discription: This is best extension board and is very cheap tbh for the value it provides.Many power ports, usb ports as well, and the wire is longer as well.I am using this for my computer setup which requires alot of power and also with a standing desk. it handles everything well without any issues and now only one wire needs to connect to home switch board.I have connected standing desk with 2 motors, 1000 watt psu computer and also a 55 inch monitor+tv in a single board with a minor rgb strip.sometimes i use phone charger on same board.all of this in just 1000rs price is just amazing. before this i had 2 honeywell boards with 4 pins only and both of those costed 1k per peice but i think this one beats every board out there.no performance issues at all even when everything is plugged in on a extension board.

review_title: I recently purchased the Portronics Power Plate 14
review_discription: I recently purchased the Portronics Power Plate 14 Extension Board, and it has exceeded my expectations! Here are the key features that make this extension board stand out:Versatile Sockets: With 10 universal sockets, I can easily plug in all my devices without any hassle.Fast Charging: The 25W Type-C PD and 3 USB charging ports are incredibly convenient for charging my gadgets quickly and efficiently.Long Cord: The 3-meter long cord provides flexibility in placing the extension board anywhere in the room.High Power Capacity: With a 2500 Watts capacity, it handles multiple high-power devices effortlessly.Reliable USB Output: The 2.1 Amp USB output ensures my devices charge safely and quickly.Overall, this extension board is perfect for home appliances and tech devices. Highly recommended!

For about 2 litres of water use half a cap of this shampoo and it creates lot of lather.  When I brought this, I also bought the large sponge.So the sponge and this car wash shampoo go extremely well together and provides a cleanliness and shine to the car and honestly, I can feel the difference.As I mentioned earlier, use a little quantity of the shampoo only as it creates lots of lather.  Excellent product.

review_title: Using it for my bicycles. Silent and smooth
review_discription: I'm using this for my bicycles . The spray does have a foaming effect a bit and penetrated even a dry chain that's seen a full season of monsoon without usage. It's not as liquidy as what I've normally used but the chain does moove smoothly, more silently and even the gear changes are very quick and smooth. I'd not recommend using this oil for lubing the brake and gear cables. It does feel sticky once dry. So far it's doing a great job on the gear deraullers and the chain. No regrets.

Product_name: 3M Car Dashboard Dresser (250 ml) | Restores Gloss and Shine on Dashboard and Other Plastic Parts | Protection from UV Rays and Fading
review_discription: The 3M Car Dashboard Dresser (250 ml) falls short of expectations. While it promises to restore gloss and shine to your dashboard and other plastic parts, the results are underwhelming. The product does provide some level of shine, but it doesn‚Äôt last as long as advertised and requires frequent reapplication. Additionally, the UV protection seems minimal, as my dashboard still showed signs of fading after a short period. The formula also leaves a greasy residue that attracts dust and dirt, making the surface look dirty quickly. Overall, while it offers some improvement in appearance, it fails to deliver on its long-term promises and value.

Product_name: Tide Plus Double Power Detergent Washing Powder Jasmine & Rose 6kg + 2kg FREE
review_title: Tide Plus Double Power Detergent Washing Powder Jasmine & Rose 6kg + 2kg FREE
review_discription: Overall: Great stain removal, cleans whites well, but scent might be too strong for some.Cleaning Power:  This detergent packs a punch! The "Stain Magnet" technology seems to work well, as I've had good results removing tough stains like grease and ketchup. It also brightens whites effectively.Scent:  The Jasmine & Rose scent is pleasant, but it is strong. If you're sensitive to scents, this might not be the best choice for you.Value:  The 6kg + 2kg FREE deal is a good value, especially if you have a large family or go through detergent quickly.Other Considerations:Suitable for both whites and colors.Dissolves easily in water.Creates good suds for a deep clean.Can be used for handwashing or in semi-automatic washing machines.Recommendation:  I would recommend this detergent to people who are looking for a powerful stain remover that brightens whites. However, if you are sensitive to scents, you might want to try a different fragrance or brand.Additional Notes:I haven't experienced any issues with fading colors, but it's always a good idea to test on a small area of clothing first, especially for delicate fabrics.Be mindful of using the correct amount of detergent - too much can leave residue on clothes.I hope this review helps you decide if Tide Plus Double Power Detergent Jasmine & Rose is the right choice for you!

review_title: "Keep Your Kitchen Clean and Tidy with Presto! Kitchen Tissue Rolls!"
review_discription: I recently started using the Amazon Brand - Presto! 2 Ply Kitchen Tissue Paper Rolls, and I am highly impressed with their quality and convenience. Here‚Äôs my detailed review:Softness and Absorbency:The kitchen tissue rolls are incredibly soft to the touch, making them gentle on the skin and suitable for various cleaning tasks. Despite their softness, they are highly absorbent, quickly soaking up spills and messes to leave surfaces clean and dry.Quantity and Value:With 6 rolls included in the pack, each containing 60 pulls (360 sheets in total), this product offers excellent value for money. The ample quantity ensures that you have an abundant supply of kitchen tissue rolls on hand for everyday use, reducing the need for frequent restocking.Durability and Strength:Despite being soft, the tissue paper rolls are surprisingly durable and strong. They hold up well to scrubbing and wiping, without tearing or disintegrating easily. This durability ensures that they effectively tackle tough cleaning tasks without falling apart.Convenience and Packaging:The rolls are conveniently sized and fit effortlessly onto standard kitchen tissue roll holders. The packaging is sturdy and easy to store, keeping the rolls protected and organized until needed. The perforated sheets tear off cleanly and smoothly, allowing for hassle-free use.Versatility:These kitchen tissue rolls are versatile and can be used for various purposes beyond cleaning spills. They are suitable for wiping surfaces, drying hands, and even as makeshift napkins or placemats during meals.Conclusion:Overall, the Amazon Brand - Presto! 2 Ply Kitchen Tissue Paper Rolls are a must-have for any household. Their softness, absorbency, durability, and convenience make them an indispensable tool for keeping the kitchen clean and tidy. If you‚Äôre looking for high-quality kitchen tissue rolls at an affordable price, look no further than Presto!

Please go for it.

Product_name: Amazon Brand - Presto! Disinfectant Surface & Floor Cleaner, (Citrus) - 2 Ltr | Kills 99.9% Germs | Suitable for Bathroom & Floor surfaces like ceramic, marble, granite, mosaic etc.
review_title: multipurpose cleaning product designed to clean and disinfect various surfaces, including floors
review_discription: Key Features:Neem Extract: Neem is a natural antiseptic, often used in traditional medicine for its antibacterial and antifungal properties. This product leverages neem extract to enhance its disinfectant qualities.Effective Cleaning: The cleaner is designed to remove tough stains, grease, and dirt from surfaces, leaving them clean and hygienic. Users generally report that it effectively cleans without leaving behind any sticky residue.Pleasant Fragrance: Unlike some harsh chemical cleaners, this product offers a mild, natural fragrance derived from neem, which many users find refreshing and less overwhelming than synthetic scents.Versatility: It can be used on a variety of surfaces, including floors, kitchen counters, bathroom tiles, and more. This makes it a convenient choice for general household cleaning.Value for Money: As part of Amazon‚Äôs private label, it‚Äôs often priced competitively, offering good value compared to other branded disinfectants.User Experience:Pros:Many users appreciate the natural neem scent, which isn‚Äôt as overpowering as some other cleaners.The product‚Äôs disinfecting properties, combined with effective cleaning, make it a popular choice for households looking to maintain hygiene.Affordable price point, making it accessible to a broad range of consumers.Cons:A few users have noted that while the neem scent is pleasant, it may not linger long after cleaning.Some customers might prefer stronger chemical-based disinfectants, especially for very high-risk areas.Overall Verdict:The Presto! Disinfectant Surface & Floor Cleaner with Neem is a solid choice for those looking for an effective and naturally scented cleaning product. It balances cleaning power with a more natural ingredient base, making it a suitable option for regular household use. However, if you require a more potent disinfectant for highly contaminated areas, you might want to consider complementing this with a stronger product.

Product_name: Amazon Brand - Presto! Disinfectant Surface & Floor Cleaner, (Citrus) - 2 Ltr | Kills 99.9% Germs | Suitable for Bathroom & Floor surfaces like ceramic, marble, granite, mosaic etc.
review_discription: I have been using it for a preety long period; it cleans the surface very well, also the smell is good and light. A small quantity for a bucket also works well. But it's actually just an acid solution in lower concentration, which in long term eventually faded the colour of the floor, which is not of marble or tiles. I worry that it may also make marble surface rough in log term. Seems safe to use on tiles. Not recommending for marble or normal floor. If necessary use in very little concentration.

review_discription: 1. BOYA BY-M1 Lavalier MicrophoneDesign & Build: It's a small, omnidirectional clip-on mic, very lightweight, and comes with a long cable (around 6 meters).Sound Quality: The sound is clear and decent for the price, with good voice pickup. It captures some ambient noise due to its omnidirectional pattern, but this is expected.Compatibility: Works with smartphones, DSLRs, camcorders, audio recorders, and PCs, thanks to its 3.5mm TRRS connector and an included 1/4‚Äù adapter.Battery: Requires a small LR44 battery when used with non-powered devices like DSLRs.Pros: Affordable, versatile, easy to use, long cable.Cons: Picks up ambient noise, battery needs to be replaced periodically.

review_title: Outstanding Sound Quality and Versatility in a Compact Package!
review_discription: I recently purchased the Boya BY-M1 Pro Omnidirectional Lavalier Condenser Microphone, and I couldn't be happier with its performance. As a content creator who frequently records videos for YouTube and interviews, finding a reliable microphone that offers clear, professional audio has always been a challenge. This little mic has exceeded all my expectations!First off, the sound quality is fantastic. The omnidirectional pickup pattern captures my voice crisply and clearly, no matter which direction I'm speaking from. The noise cancellation feature does an excellent job of minimizing background noise, which is a lifesaver when I'm recording outdoors or in busy environments.
